name: Schnaeppchen Widget
author: reichweite.de

sections.installation:
The installation of this plugin is simple.

  1. Upload the ‘schnaeppchen-widget’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Navigate to the ‘Widgets’ submenu in the ‘Design’ menu
  4. Move the Widget to the sidebar via drag&drop
sections.faq:
Q: Why should I use this plugin?
A: It allows you to have new, fresh and interesting content on your blog, which brings you more views. Your Users will be happy making bargains.

Q: Is the use of this plugin/widget free?
A: Yes, it’s free. You don’t have to pay neither for the widget nor for the content shown.

Q: How often do you update the offers?
A: The offers are updated several times a day, sometimes even ten times a day.

short_description: This Plugin provides a widget that allows the user to display actual bargains (Schn√§ppchen) in the sidebar. You can choose the number of articles to show and where you get them from (reichweite.de or schnaeppchenforum.com). Why should you use this plugin / widget? It allows you to have new, fresh and interesting content on your blog, which brings you more views. The RSS-Feeds are updated several times a day, up to 10 times/day!
